Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png'}
{1: '1', 3: "Noctis grabs the mechanoid by its shattered breastplate with one hand. Before his other hand can strike, the mechanoid's fist lands on Noctis' face first."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Ha! You're quite a punching bag!", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "While Noctis takes a punch square in the jaw, No. 21 uses the window to exploit a weak point on the mechanoid's body, tearing its left arm off."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "You're not going to live long!", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "Having taken a punch, Noctis responds with a blow to the mechanoid's head in this mano o mano, crushing half of its brain."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "It only has half a head left! Why won't it die?!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Get rid of the other half, then!', 4: '1'}
{3: "The mechanoid ducks under Noctis' next strike, but it cannot dodge Vera's banner spear."}
{3: "Vera's banner spear flies right next to Noctis' cheek, piercing the remaining half of the mechanoid's head."}
{3: 'Noctis spits, finally letting go of the mechanoid. It drops on the ground like a pile of scraps.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Never encountered such a tough toaster before.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "It's a whole new type of enemy...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Looking around, they find the enemies that have crawled out of the sand scattering to the four winds.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'The Punishing Virus concentration has returned to a normal level.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera walks to the remains of the mechanoid next to Noctis and steps on its crushed head, pulling her banner spear out.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "It's not built like the rest of the junk we saw here. It probably came from elsewhere.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'But this confusing and unnecessary decoration seems familiar.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Hmph. Perhaps it belonged to the garage owner's gang.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera gives the barbed-wire-like decoration made of nails and galvanized iron a kick.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Let's head out, Noctis, No. 21.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "The storm has settled. I don't know if we will run into other enemies. Let's take this opportunity and go.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Bring him with us, obviously. Why else would I save him? He's not in any immediate danger right now. He just passed out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We'll leave him in the next settlement. We still have a mission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Let's go, then?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Noctis carries the long-unconscious Beardy on his back and stands next to Vera.'}
{3: "Even when he is out, this middle-aged man's arms still cling to the projector and the films in his pockets tightly, the knife in his hand reflecting the waning moonlight."}
